name: Matthew Danskey
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Page.
Very shortly, this will be home to a portfolio of what I've done and what I'm currently working on -- as well as a blog.

### Who I am
I'm a burgeoning programmer from the very first class of the Portland Code School. I've been doing contract work ever since for a local company, and I am in the market for a job that challenges me, recognizes that there's more to life than coding (even though coding is nifty) and a balance is to be had, and hopefully that wants to make the world a better place.

### Portfolio (with screenshots)
Coming soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
